data.comment: The match is underway at Anfield.
Mike Dean signals a Sheffield throw-in in Liverpool's half.
In the minute 2, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 3, Trent Alexander-Arnold gets his shot on target but fails to score for Liverpool.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
John Lundstram is booked for the away team.
Roberto Firmino of Liverpool is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 5, Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
Mike Dean signals a throw-in for Sheffield, close to Liverpool's area.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 6, Liverpool have a goal kick.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 10, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Sheffield have been given a penalty...
In the minute 13, Sander Berge nets and Sheffield now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Mike Dean awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Sheffield.
Liverpool's Georginio Wijnaldum gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Anfield.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Sheffield.
Sheffield's Oliver McBurnie breaks free at Anfield. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
Important block from the Liverpool defence as Sander Berge fires in a strike for Sheffield.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
In the minute 22, Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sheffield's Ben Osborn gets in a shot on goal at Anfield. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick Liverpool.
In the minute 25, Free kick Sheffield.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 27, Liverpool to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
In Liverpool, Jordan Henderson of Liverpool is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Liverpool.
In the minute 35, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Liverpool are pushing forward but Fabinho's finish is wide of the goal.
Mike Dean awards Sheffield a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Sheffield at Anfield.
Goal kick for Sheffield at Anfield.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Sadio Mane for Liverpool drives towards goal at Anfield. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Roberto Firmino is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In Liverpool Liverpool drive forward through Mohamed Salah. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Liverpool.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Liverpool.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Sheffield's Chris Basham gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Liverpool defender.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Anfield.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 48, Sheffield push forward at Anfield and George Baldock gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Liverpool defence.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Mike Dean awards Sheffield a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Mohamed Salah for Liverpool gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, The away team have replaced Rhian Brewster with Oliver Burke. This is the first substitution made today by Chris Wilder.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Sheffield.
Andrew Robertson (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 56, Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in Liverpool.
Throw-in Sheffield.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
In the minute 58, Sheffield needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Sheffield at Anfield.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
Mike Dean signals a Sheffield throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Sheffield drive upfield and Oliver Burke gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Liverpool defender.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Mike Dean blows against Liverpool's Mohamed Salah for offside.
Diogo Jota scores with a header and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 64, That's a fine assist from Sadio Mane.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Liverpool just outside Sheffield's area.
At Anfield, Enda Stevens has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Sheffield's John Lundstram gets in a shot on goal at Anfield. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
Chris Wilder is making the team's second substitution at Anfield with David McGoldrick replacing John Lundstram.
In the minute 77, Sheffield are coming forward and David McGoldrick gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Liverpool at Anfield.
Liverpool are on the attack at Anfield, where Mohamed Salah is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 83, In Liverpool Sheffield attack through Ethan Ampadu. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
James Milner is replacing Diogo Jota for the home team.
In the minute 83, The home team replace Roberto Firmino with Takumi Minamino.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
In Liverpool, Enda Stevens of Sheffield is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 86, Sander Berge (Sheffield) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 87, Mike Dean awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Oliver Burke of Sheffield gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Throw-in Sheffield.
That's full-time at Anfield. The final score is 2-1.
